verbs.description: [ARG1: husband] [V: becomes] [ARG2: nurse] [ARGM-TMP: after wife dies from breast cancer] a man who lost his wife to breast cancer two years ago has left his job in the business world to train to become a nurse in honor of her memory ruthie conley jill brzezinski conley hoda kotb averie brzezinski cancer paris new york city norton women kentucky children hospital louisville menopause breast cancer awareness breast cancer jill brzezinski - conley bart
